summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lumina Senegal e-commerce site. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend core features working well with minor UI issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Search icon opens modal but search input field not accessible
Overlay prevents clicking wishlist button on product page

integration_issues.issue: Admin login form submits but doesn't reach admin dashboard

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section and products
All navigation menu items work (6/6 categories)
Category pages display products correctly (5 products in electronics)
Product detail page shows all info and pricing
Cart drawer opens and displays items
Checkout flow complete with shipping form
Payment method selection (Wave, Orange Money, CB, Cash)
All 29 backend API endpoints working (100% success)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin login flow - form submits but doesn't navigate to admin dashboard. Improve search functionality - make search input accessible after clicking search icon. Minor: fix wishlist button overlay issue on product pages.
